Parallels.ab: haōməmca para.haōməmca yazamaide [...] aēsmąsca baōδīmca yazamaide ~ Y3.2, Y4.1, Y4.3, Y8.2 haōməmca para.haōməmca aēsmąsca baōiδīmca; ~ Y7.30 haōməmca para.haōməmca yazamaide aēsmąsca baōiδīmca yazamaide.

zaraϑuštrahe spitāmahe iδa aṣ̌aōnō aṣ̌īmca frauuaṣ̌īmca yazamaide = Y10.21, Y13.7, Y26.4, Y59.23, VrS51.5, VrS81.22, DrYt4.13; ~ Y4.24, Y24.5 āat̰ dīš āuuaēδaiiamahi zaraϑuštrahe spitāmahe aṣ̌aōnō frauuaṣ̌ə̄e; ~ Y3.2, Y3.22, Y3.23, Y7.3, Y7.23, Y7.24 xšnūmaine zaraϑuštrahe spitāmahe aṣ̌aōnō frauuaṣ̌əe; ~ Y68.30 nəmō zaraϑuštrahe spitāmahe aṣ̌aōnō frauuaṣ̌ə̄e.
aēsmąsca baōiδīmca yazamaide ~ Y62.2 dāitiiō.aēsmi buiiā̊ dāitiiō.baōiδi buiiā̊.
